title: Retro Game Sprite
description: Turns any portrait into a 16-bit RPG character.
prompt: Pixel art style, 16-bit SNES aesthetics, vibrant colors, isolated on white background, sharp edges, RPG character design, retro gaming vibe.

title: Cyberpunk Portrait
description: Transform casual photos into neon-lit futuristic street art.
prompt: Cyberpunk aesthetics, neon blue and pink lighting, futuristic city background, highly detailed tech-wear, glowing eyes, cinematic lighting, 8k resolution.

title: Studio Ghibli Vibe
description: Soft, painterly anime style for landscape photos.
prompt: Studio Ghibli style, hand-painted texture, lush green meadows, soft fluffy clouds, vibrant blue sky, whimsical atmosphere, cinematic anime background.
